place_graffiti.text: A small, green-glowing hand drawn on a wall.
A drawing of directional arrows contradicting each other. Whoever drew this, had no idea where to go either.
A small, green-glowing hand drawn on a wall.
Can't take the Madre from me
A drawing of an arrow pointing up and north.
An image of a dead head with an arrow through it.
